thread.section_title: Holiday Inn Express New York City Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect Hotel at the perfect place!!
thread.title_full: Perfect Hotel at the perfect place!! - Review of Holiday Inn Express New York City Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Kunj C
title: Perfect Hotel at the perfect place!!
text: Bang on! In the heart of New York City!! Times square is a five minutes walk from the hotel! The staff is good and they have complimentary breakfast on the house which is great! The rooms are considerably quite small but at the price, it is good enough!
